## GitDocumentDB.validateDirpath() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Validate dirpath

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
validateDirpath(dirpath: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dirpath | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Exceptions

[InvalidDirpathCharacterError](./git-documentdb.invaliddirpathcharactererror.md)

[InvalidDirpathLengthError](./git-documentdb.invaliddirpathlengtherror.md)

## Remarks

- dirpath only allows \*\*a to z, A to Z, 0 to 9, and these 8 punctuation marks \_ - . / ( ) \[ \]\*\*.

- dirpath cannot end with a period . (For compatibility with the file system of Windows)

- A length of an dirpath value must be equal to or less than MAX\_LENGTH\_OF\_KEY(64).
